metadata.title: CVE-2013-5648 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in the handleStartDataFile functionin DigiDocSAXParser.c in libdigidoc 3.6.0.0, as used in ID-software before3.7.2 and other products, allows remote attackers to overwrite arbitraryfiles via a filename beginning with / (slash) or \ (backslash) in a DDOCfile.

criterions.comment: libdigidoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
